pages.text: This is an adventure mod, which features an infinite desert.
If you wanna enter Atum, you need a scarab and a portal frame. Throw the scarab in the frame, the portal will show up.
pages.title: Portal
Desert Enemies
pages.text: Atum is an dangerous world, you will meet these hostile guys often.

pages.title: Pyramid
pages.text: Exploring pyramids is the best way to obtain treasures in this mod. You can easily find them on the minimap.$(br)$(br)    The doors of pyramids are usually buried in sands, and you need Nebu Torches to open the Quandary.

If you have entered a pyramid, you nedd to go thru a maze with many traps, but you can turn them off with a pickaxe.$(br)$(br)    Then you need to enter the Pharaoh's Tombroom, Nebu Toeches are also needed to open the sarcophahgus.
Kill him and get his relics!
